qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run still not clean
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: As of 2026-02-12, targeted reruns against compose-backed setup remain red (`ai-assistant-hybrid`, `audit-logs`, `llm-generate`). Full-suite green validation is still blocked.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: `llm-generate.spec.ts` still fails. Mocked `llm/generate` calls are observed, but assistant UI does not render expected response/error/tool-confirmation state.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: `tests/audit-logs.spec.ts` still renders only fallback row in compose-backed runs, despite intercepted API call count being > 0.

qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.title: Playwright API mocks are still not deterministic for critical UI assertions
qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.details: Observed on 2026-02-12: route intercept counters advance, but UI state does not reliably reflect mocked payloads for `ai-assistant-hybrid`, `audit-logs`, and `llm-generate`.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-e2e-cross-origin-t.title: Compose-backed E2E still times out on hub-bound UI calls
qa-2026-02-12-compose-e2e-cross-origin-t.details: With `ANANTA_E2E_USE_EXISTING=1` and hub at `http://localhost:5000`, targeted specs still fail. Assistant bubble stays empty while `Working...` persists, and expected mocked SGPT/LLM output is not rendered.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows still need full-run confirmation
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: Current stabilization work focused on LLM/audit/hybrid failures. Full teams/templates confirmation is still pending.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis host tuning warning remains non-blocking but unresolved.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.title: Compose-lite postgres logs report missing locale binary
qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.details: Postgres container logs contain `sh: locale: not found` and `no usable system locales were found` during init; service becomes healthy.
